div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 13:35 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. North northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 34. North wind around 5 mph becoming calm after midnight.

A 30 percent chance of showers, mainly after 4pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 63. Breezy, with a light southwest wind becoming west southwest 15 to 20 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.
